synopsis.text: Kagari Izuriha, a girl in a wheelchair, watches as her best friend, Yomi Takanashi, forms a bond with the lively Mato Kuroi. In another world, a girl with jet-black hair and a glowing blue eye, known as Blackâ˜…Rock Shooter, battles against an unknown enemy. Meanwhile, in the real world, Mato and Yomi's friendship blossoms over a shared love for a picture book called 'Li'l Birds At Play'. However, their relationship is tested as they navigate the trials and tribulations of middle school, all while being unaware of the parallel universe where their alternate selves fight for survival. This is the story of two girls, in two worlds, and the pain they must endure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
